Real-time Simulation of H-bridge Thyristor Inverter
=====================================================
Usage:
1.) Open http://www.falstad.com/circuit/circuitjs.html
2.) Go to "File" ==> "Import From Text"
3.) Paste entire text below "CUT HERE" into text box and click OK
4.) Enjoy & understand :) 

Supports: Real commutation, Wechselrichterkippen, active or passive load,
adjustment of firing angle, half controlled brigdes (B2HZ or B2HK)

Issues:
1.) Commutation leads to large voltage spikes all over the circuit. Those spikes lead to unwanted descaling of the diagrams so the interesting voltages are not visible anymore. In order to prevent they are reduced by a
capacitor/diode snubber network ("descaling preventor"). Editing may lead to convergence problems with the solver.

2.) Firing angle must be provided negatively, and there is no prevention from entering angles > pi.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits for simulator go entirely to Paul Falstad (http://www.falstad.com/), Iain Sharp (http://lushprojects.com/),
and many more (See "About")!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


--------------------------------CUT HERE----------------------------------
$ 1 0.000002 1.500424758475255 31 207 43

r 496 544 496 336 0 100000
r 544 256 496 256 0 1
w 608 336 496 336 0
l 544 256 592 256 0 0.1 0
w 704 336 608 336 0
w 592 256 672 256 0
